name: fznn0sub
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, co(c1, cfz, c2)), wcel(co(c2, cmin, c0), cn0), wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, c0)))

|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cfz, c2)), wcel(co(c2, cmin, c0), cn0))

-| wi(wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(co(c2, cmin, c0), cn0))

comment: Subtraction closure for a member of a finite set of sequential integers. (Contributed by NM, 16-Sep-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2015.)
